seo.title: Shopping Cart - Review Your Order
seo.description: Review your cart items before checkout. Add, remove, or modify your domain, hosting, and SSL certificate selections. Transparent pricing, no hidden fees.

title: Your cart
description: Review your items. You can change or remove anything before checkout.

empty.title: Your cart is empty
empty.description: Start adding items to see them here.

guarantees.changeCancel: You can change or cancel anytime during checkout
guarantees.noSurprises: No surprise charges. Clear pricing, always
guarantees.secureCheckout: Secure checkout with multiple payment options

errors.invalidCoupon: Invalid coupon code. Please try again.
